dmca.title: [EV1-C1309136Q] Returned mail: see transcript for details
dmca.body:
-----Original Message----- > From: abuse@ev1.net [mailto:abuse@ev1.net] Posted At: Wednesday, > October 11, 2006 6:04 AM Posted To: Copyright > Conversation: [EV1-C1309136Q] Returned mail: see transcript for > details > Subject: [EV1-C1309136Q] Returned mail: see transcript for details > > > ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== > 1. Returned mail: see transcript for details Added by system at > Wednesday, Oct 11 2006 09:15 am > X-MailFrom: root@mail.ev1.net > X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net > Received: from [207.218.192.102] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for > ; Wed Oct 11 10:12:43 2006 > Received: from SMTP32-FWD by mail.ev1.net > (SMTP32) id A00000258; Wed, 11 Oct 2006 10:11:42 -0500 > Received: from abacus.ev1servers.net [216.12.192.78] by mail.ev1.net > with ESMTP > (SMTPD32-6.06) id A9AC5FF01A4; Wed, 11 Oct 2006 10:11:40 -0500 > Received: from localhost (localhost) > by abacus.ev1servers.net (8.13.1/8.13.1) id k9BFCe7s014872; Wed, 11 > Oct 2006 10:12:40 -0500 > Date: Wed, 11 Oct 2006 10:12:40 -0500 > From: Mail Delivery Subsystem > Message-Id: <200610111512.k9BFCe7s014872@abacus.ev1servers.net> > To: > MIME-Version: 1.0 > Content-Type: multipart/report; report-type=delivery-status; > boundary="k9BFCe7s014872.1160579560/abacus.ev1servers.net" > Subject: Returned mail: see transcript for details > Auto-Submitted: auto-generated (failure) > X-Declude-Sender: <> [216.12.192.78] > X-Spam-Tests-Failed: None [0] > X-Note: This E-mail was sent from abacus.ev1servers.net > ([216.12.192.78]). > > (multipart/report) > Multipart prefix (text/plain) > This is a MIME-encapsulated message > > MIME element (text/plain) > The original message was received at Wed, 11 Oct 2006 10:12:38 -0500 > from localhost.domain [127.0.0.1] > > ----- The following addresses had permanent fatal errors ----- > > (reason: 550 access denied R) > > ----- Transcript of session follows ----- ... while talking to > inbound.filter.theplanet.com.: >>>> DATA > <<< 550 access denied R > 550 5.1.1 ... User unknown <<< 503 valid > RCPT command must precede DATA > > MIME element (message/delivery-status) Encapsulated message > (message/rfc822) Headers of embedded message (message/rfc822) > Return-Path: > Received: from there (localhost.domain [127.0.0.1]) > by abacus.ev1servers.net (8.13.1/8.13.1) with SMTP id k9BFCc7s014870 > for ; Wed, 11 Oct 2006 10:12:38 -0500 > Message-Id: <200610111512.k9BFCc7s014870@abacus.ev1servers.net> > From: abuse@ev1.net > To: copywright@theplanet.com > Cc: > Subject: [EV1-C1308928S] Aflac Cease and Desist; Ref: 2.3.123 > [ID3:_bZeHZb\lTc19:ID3] > Date: Wed, 11 Oct 2006 10:12:38 +0000 > > Non-MIME element (text/plain) > Return-Path: > Received: from there (localhost.domain [127.0.0.1]) > by abacus.ev1servers.net (8.13.1/8.13.1) with SMTP id k9BFCc7s014870 > for ; Wed, 11 Oct 2006 10:12:38 -0500 > Message-Id: <200610111512.k9BFCc7s014870@abacus.ev1servers.net> > From: abuse@ev1.net > To: copywright@theplanet.com > Cc: > Subject: [EV1-C1308928S] Aflac Cease and Desist; Ref: 2.3.123 > [ID3:_bZeHZb\lTc19:ID3] > Date: Wed, 11 Oct 2006 10:12:38 +0000 > > ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== > 1. > envelope-from=aflacbrandprotection@aflac.com; helo=cyveillance.com; > X-OriginalArrivalTime: 11 Oct 2006 14:57:05.0600 (UTC) > FILETIME=[845F4400:01C6ED45] > > MIME element (text/html) >

10/11/2006 "urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:office" />

class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"> size=2> 

>

size=2>Dear ITCG sp. z o.o.:

size=2> 

>

size=2>American Family Life Assurance Company of Columbus (Aflac) is > the registered owner of the trademark Aflac. We recently became aware > of your use of our trademarked word Aflac in meta tags (and/or hidden > text) at http://3414.2jbcju.info/ to attract internet traffic to your > website. Your use of this trademark to attract internet traffic is an > obvious attempt to capitalize upon the goodwill associated with the > Aflac name.  >

>

size=2> 

>

size=2>Accordingly, we demand that you immediately cease and desist > from any further use of the Aflac mark in meta tags (and/or hidden > text) on your website. Additionally, Aflac must receive a reply to > this email within five (5) days from the date of this letter as > written confirmation that you will make no use of the Aflac marks in > the future. We will be > monitoring your website and we await your written confirmation via > email to face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" > size=2>aflacbrandprotection@aflac.com size=2>.

>

size=2> 

>

Nothing in this email shall be deemed a > waiver of any rights or remedies of Aflac, all of which are expressly > reserved.

>

size=2> 

>

size=2>Should you have any questions about this matter, please do not > hesitate to contact href="mailto:aflacbrandprotection@aflac.com">aflacbrandprotection@aflac. > com face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif" size=2> face="Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif"> size=2>.

>

size=2> 

style="FONT-SIZE: 11pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial">

Sincerely,

>

Brand Protection > Coordinator

Aflac > Worldwide Headquarters
"urn:schemas-microsoft-com:office:smarttags" /> w:st="on">1932 Wynnton > Road

>

w:st="on">Columbus, w:st="on">Georgia style="FONT-SIZE: 10pt; FONT-FAMILY: Arial"> 31999

class=MsoNormal style="MARGIN: 0in 0in 0pt"> 

>

Fax: 706.320.2288
